snippet: After being assessed a two-stroke penalty Saturday for hitting from the wrong spot on the 15th hole a day earlier at the Masters, Tiger Woods finished the third round at three under par.
abstract: Tiger Woods is assessed two-stroke penalty for rules violation at Masters Golf Tournament, but is not disqualified.
lead_paragraph: After being assessed a two-stroke penalty Saturday for hitting from the wrong spot on the 15th hole a day earlier at the Masters, Tiger Woods finished the third round at three under par.

headline.seo: Woods Penalized for Illegal Ball Drop at Augusta
headline.main: After Two-Stroke Penalty, Woods Plays On
headline.print_headline:
Bad Drop, Soft Landing | Rules Officials
Penalize Woods But Allow Him To Stay in Field
